info.name: FAIL.in.th - Horizontal Style
info.description: Makes FAIL.in.th flow from left to right, instead of top to bottom. Great for very large wide screens, like 1920x1080.
info.additionalInfo:
- ads are moved to the left.
- the pagination at the top right (fixed position).
- each fail entry goes from left to right.
- in single view, the comments are displayed right to the image.
